channel.title: sillygwailo tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from sillygwailo.

item.description: First time in a long time I’ve seen Chinese in an English-language novel. That’s a phrase I’d get very familiar with early on in my Chinese lessons, so I got the joke right away. https://t.co/1AhhqOA5GB
item.source:markdown: First time in a long time I’ve seen Chinese in an English-language novel. That’s a phrase I’d get very familiar with early on in my Chinese lessons, so I got the joke right away. https://t.co/1AhhqOA5GB

item.description: HYFR. https://t.co/WR9dyrc8PB
item.source:markdown: HYFR. https://t.co/WR9dyrc8PB

item.description: I got a lot of love to give, and right now my only outlet is my Quarto website. https://t.co/xdDRbbHfea
item.source:markdown: I got a lot of love to give, and right now my only outlet is my Quarto website. https://t.co/xdDRbbHfea

item.description: @joshtpm Has the law set a date for when it’s coming?
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm Has the law set a date for when it’s coming?

item.description: @rtanglao Possibly. I don’t have a flight back to Toronto booked yet, so it’s a fairly open-ended trip.
item.source:markdown: @rtanglao Possibly. I don’t have a flight back to Toronto booked yet, so it’s a fairly open-ended trip.

item.description: If you’re in Toronto and love this movie, or haven’t seen it yet, see it this coming Thursday at @RevueCinema in Roncesvalles. https://t.co/HtMzNweixM
item.source:markdown: If you’re in Toronto and love this movie, or haven’t seen it yet, see it this coming Thursday at @RevueCinema in Roncesvalles. https://t.co/HtMzNweixM

item.description: @Kimli That sucks. A lot. Hoping for the best. Let’s connect on LinkedIn. There’s technical writers in my network that may be hiring.
item.source:markdown: @Kimli That sucks. A lot. Hoping for the best. Let’s connect on LinkedIn. There’s technical writers in my network that may be hiring.

item.description: @gruber I use tab groups to name the task I’m working on that requires switching between tabs. That’s as a way to keep my focus on the task and, if I get distracted, I know what those tabs were for. As soon as the task is done, I ruthlessly close the tab group.
item.source:markdown: @gruber I use tab groups to name the task I’m working on that requires switching between tabs. That’s as a way to keep my focus on the task and, if I get distracted, I know what those tabs were for. As soon as the task is done, I ruthlessly close the tab group.

item.description: Anybody need a house sitter in Hamilton in September? I’d like to test-drive living there.
item.source:markdown: Anybody need a house sitter in Hamilton in September? I’d like to test-drive living there.

item.description: It’s still sometimes astonishing to me that people still use Foursquare’s Swarm app.
item.source:markdown: It’s still sometimes astonishing to me that people still use Foursquare’s Swarm app.

item.description: I’ll be in B.C. for an indefinite period starting in mid-August.
item.source:markdown: I’ll be in B.C. for an indefinite period starting in mid-August.

item.description:
Mass shootings always end up being worse than they initially sound.

See? Mass shootings always always end up being worse than they initially sound. https://t.co/kqNFC43pV2

item.description: The @ElectionDigest account natively RTs tweets about the 2022 Toronto municipal election (and beyond?).
item.source:markdown: The @ElectionDigest account natively RTs tweets about the 2022 Toronto municipal election (and beyond?).

item.description: @toddsieling Is this tiny screenshot going to be not only comically expanded to fill the frame but also be cut off on both sides? Anyway, there’s also this. https://t.co/MRJlcw0dlH
item.source:markdown: @toddsieling Is this tiny screenshot going to be not only comically expanded to fill the frame but also be cut off on both sides? Anyway, there’s also this. https://t.co/MRJlcw0dlH

item.description:
Thunder you can feel. #dlws

The disappointing thing about the rain in Toronto is that it never feels cleansing. At least in Vancouver, after the rain, it felt like you could sin without feeling guilty for a few days. Not here.
item.source:markdown:
Thunder you can feel. #dlws
The disappointing thing about the rain in Toronto is that it never feels cleansing. At least in Vancouver, after the rain, it felt like you could sin without feeling guilty for a few days. Not here.

item.description: Assuming I’m still living in Toronto, I’ll see them in March! https://t.co/RSMo58wZmr

item.description: I’m no longer thinking of going to Gdańsk in October.
item.source:markdown: I’m no longer thinking of going to Gdańsk in October.

item.description: Can any of my SF friends help JJ out with recommendations? https://t.co/exOUG9oh4G

item.description: @T0tallyn0tPr1me Ah, shit. That must have killed. With RTJ on stage. I wondered why they didn’t do a song together in the two shows I saw before that one.
item.source:markdown: @T0tallyn0tPr1me Ah, shit. That must have killed. With RTJ on stage. I wondered why they didn’t do a song together in the two shows I saw before that one.

item.description: I’ve decided to start using Clubhouse again.
item.source:markdown: I’ve decided to start using Clubhouse again.

item.description: @joshtpm I suspect I had it in November 2021, but I didn’t think the cold I couldn’t shake for a couple of weeks was serious enough to get a test. If I indeed never got it, it was because I stayed at home and only ever ventured out for necessities for over a year, always wearing a mask.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm I suspect I had it in November 2021, but I didn’t think the cold I couldn’t shake for a couple of weeks was serious enough to get a test. If I indeed never got it, it was because I stayed at home and only ever ventured out for necessities for over a year, always wearing a mask.

item.description: @joshtpm I suspect I had it in November 2021, but at the time I didn’t think the cold I couldn’t shake for a couple of weeks was serious enough to get a test. If I indeed never got it, it was because I stayed at home and only ever ventured out for necessities for over a year.
item.source:markdown: @joshtpm I suspect I had it in November 2021, but at the time I didn’t think the cold I couldn’t shake for a couple of weeks was serious enough to get a test. If I indeed never got it, it was because I stayed at home and only ever ventured out for necessities for over a year.

item.description: @fakehistoryhunt I love these. I hate the AI that makes fake still photos, but love the AI that creates these living portraits. Through these tweets, I realized I love Live Photos (Apple’s name for 2-second extremely short videos), which, I must say, I didn’t get the appeal of before your tweets.
item.source:markdown: @fakehistoryhunt I love these. I hate the AI that makes fake still photos, but love the AI that creates these living portraits. Through these tweets, I realized I love Live Photos (Apple’s name for 2-second extremely short videos), which, I must say, I didn’t get the appeal of before your tweets.

item.description: Covie is definitely ovie in Downtown Toronto.
item.source:markdown: Covie is definitely ovie in Downtown Toronto.
